channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Looks like someone using the pavement to access their driveway, 14th February
item.description:
Day by day this problem is getting worse. Someone is driving over the grass verge and across the pavement. It’s drawing more and more loose dirt onto the pavement. It hard to pass it without walking through it.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 7, Arnos Grove, Southgate, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Outside 25 Stukeley street wc2b, 14th February
item.description:
The one way sign outside 25 Stukeley street light not working , it’s on a bend , drivers can’t see at night I nearly got run over last night as they came up one way street
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 20-22, Stukeley Street, Bloomsbury, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Wooden bollards are out of place and lying on pavement, 14th February
item.description:
Several wooden bollards along Oakwood avenue, between 31 and 23 have been knocked out of place and are now lying on pavement / grass bed. There was one to start nearly 6 months ago and now others have joined within the last couple.of months

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 14, Oakwood Avenue, Southgate, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Graffiti sprayed on the walls, 14th February
item.description:
There is graffiti sprayed on the two opposite walls of the houses that form the alley way.the alley way is between Ridley Road and Anthony Road.another example of people who don’t live here treating not respecting our neighbourhood.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Anthony Road, East Wickham, Greater London

item.title: Drains blocked, 14th February
item.description:
The drains at the nursery keep getting block ed every couple of weeks. 10m of the drains are in the pavement outside. Thames water came out multiple times last year to fix what they thought was a leak.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 79, London Lane, Plaistow, Greater London

item.title: Not Resolved!, 14th February
item.description:
